bt.net.portmapping

Interface PortMapper

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    NoOpPortMapper, UpnpPortMapper

    public interface PortMapper
    Service, that maps ports for incoming connections on network gateway.
    Since:
    1.8

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void mapPort(int port, String address, PortMapProtocol protocol, String mappingDescription)
      Map port for incoming connections on network gateway.

    • Method Detail

      • mapPort

        void mapPort(int port,
             String address,
             PortMapProtocol protocol,
             String mappingDescription)
        Map port for incoming connections on network gateway.
        Parameters:
        port - mapped port;
        address - address to which incoming connections will be forwarded (usually address of current computer);
        protocol - network protocol, which will be used on mapped port (TCP/UDP);
        mappingDescription - description of the mapping, which will be displayed on network gateway device;
        Since:
        1.8
